content: --आवर्तः [आर्या आवर्तंते अत्र] ‘abode of the noble or excellent (Āryas);’ particularly <ab>N.</ab> of the tract extending from the eastern to the western ocean, and bounded on the north and south by the Himālaya and Vindhya respectively; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 2. 22</ls>; आसमुद्रात्तु वै पूर्वादासमुद्राच्च पश्चिमात् . तयोरेवांतरं गिर्योः (हिमवद्विंध्ययोः) आर्यावर्तं विदुर्बुधाः; also <ls n="Ms.">10. 34.</ls>
